attributes.action: Force Ebay to to a u-turn on the new feedback system and make it a level field again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ebay have changed there feedback system for buyers and sellers - Buyers can now only leave a + comment and sellers can leave a - Neutral or + (ebay count Neturals as 1/2 a Neg) sellers only really leave neg feedback for a buyer if they dont pay for the auction which by bidding entered in to a legally binding contact to purchase, most buyers and sellers are a good bunch but there is a small % which sellers need to be warned about and it was the feedback system which aided this! now sellers dont have any system they are forced into + feedback leaving only!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
